sn45.33:1.2: “Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ariyo atthangiko maggo viraddho, viraddho tesam ariyo atthangiko maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn45.33:1.3: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ariyo atthangiko maggo araddho, araddho tesam ariyo atthangiko maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn45.33:1.4: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo atthangiko maggo?
sn45.33:1.6: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo viraddho, viraddho tesam ariyo atthangiko maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn45.33:1.7: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo araddho, araddho tesam ariyo atthangiko maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami”ti.
